title: How many ppm of phosgene will kill me in 1 minute? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Lethal dose of phosgene in humans is approximately 500 ppm/min of exposure or exposure at 3 ppm for 170 min is equally as fatal as exposure at 30 ppm for 17 min.” The source for this answer: Accidental phosgene gas exposure: A review with background study of 10 cases
